item.title: A year after Travis Scott's Astroworld disaster left 10 dead, are crowded concerts any safer?
item.description: In the year since the Astroworld disaster in which 10 fans were killed, has anything happened to make crowded concerts safer? Not really.
item.author: USA TODAY
item.dc:creator: Maria Puente, Marco della Cava and Melissa Ruggieri, USA TODAY
item.content:encoded: In the year since the Astroworld disaster in which 10 fans were killed, has anything happened to make crowded concerts safer? Not really.

item.title: Herschel Walker is in tight U.S. Senate race. His former Cowboys teammates did not see this coming.
item.description: As midterms loom, several former Dallas Cowboys, including Jimmy Johnson, discuss Herschel Walker and share a range of reactions to his Senate run.
item.author: USA TODAY
item.dc:creator: Jarrett Bell, USA TODAY
item.content:encoded: As midterms loom, several former Dallas Cowboys, including Jimmy Johnson, discuss Herschel Walker and share a range of reactions to his Senate run.

item.title: Debate recap: Top moments from the last debates leading up to election night
item.description: From Georgia's gubernatorial race to the New Hampshire Senate race, candidates made their final pitch to voters in debates the week before election day.

item.dc:creator: Savannah Kuchar, USA TODAY
item.content:encoded: From Georgia's gubernatorial race to the New Hampshire Senate race, candidates made their final pitch to voters in debates the week before election day.

item.title: Backing candidates down to the state level, Trump's fundraising machine builds a party loyal to him
item.description: Ex-president Donald Trump is using the Save America PAC to try to shape a Trump-centric GOP, funding candidates from statehouses up to federal office.
item.author: USA TODAY
item.dc:creator: Erin Mansfield and Candy Woodall, USA TODAY
item.content:encoded: Ex-president Donald Trump is using the Save America PAC to try to shape a Trump-centric GOP, funding candidates from statehouses up to federal office.

item.title: Hasan Minhaj addresses his 'unhinged' 'Celebrity Jeopardy!' appearance: 'Fans hate my guts'

item.content:encoded: Hasan Minhaj responded to backlash over his "Celebrity Jeopardy!" antics: "I'm sorry for trying to make 'Jeopardy!' fun."

item.title: Supreme Court Justice Barrett denies second challenge to Biden student loan forgiveness program

item.title: Evangelical voters want the broken immigration system fixed. Will GOP leaders listen?

item.content:encoded: The message from evangelicals to Congress couldn't be more clear: Please be serious about fixing a broken border and a broken immigration system.

item.title: 1 dead, dozens hurt as tornadoes hit Texas and Oklahoma

item.title: After COVID and monkeypox, it's time to rethink how U.S. responds to infectious diseases

item.title: Details emerge in Paul Pelosi attack: A break-in, conversation, 911 call, then violence

item.content:encoded: Court records and statements by prosecutors and police have painted a detailed account of the hammer attack on Nancy Pelosi's husband, Paul Pelosi.

item.title: Tennessee had a huge spike in applications after the Alabama win, and the trend continues

item.content:encoded: As Tennessee football has embarked on an unprecedented run to open the 2022 season, first-year student applications have increased nearly 50%.

item.title: A climate reckoning for US housing: Too many homes in harm's way, 'too many zeros' in the costs

item.content:encoded: When floods or fires destroy American communities, taxpayers often pick up the tab. But as climate change sends costs soaring, where is the limit?

item.title: 'He's only 10': Florida school employee presses charges against student after she says she was groped during hug

item.title: House committee investigating Jan. 6 riot says Trump must begin producing records by next week
item.description: The House select committee investigating Jan. 6 announced Friday night that they are now in contact with former President Trump after the committee issued a subpoena for him to testify in its last hearing.

item.content:encoded: The House select committee investigating Jan. 6 announced Friday night that they are now in contact with former President Trump after the committee issued a subpoena for him to testify in its last hearing.

item.title: Florida homeowners devastated by Hurricane Ian told to pay for water they can't use or face¬†$27,000 bill
item.description: A policy that requires homeowners in a North Port suburb to pay $27,000 in fees to reconnect to water and sewers may change after Hurricane Ian.
item.author: Sarasota Herald-Tribune
item.dc:creator: Earle Kimel, Sarasota Herald-Tribune
item.content:encoded: A policy that requires homeowners in a North Port suburb to pay $27,000 in fees to reconnect to water and sewers may change after Hurricane Ian.

item.title: Wizards' Deni Avdija, NBA's lone Jewish player, addresses Kyrie Irving controversy

item.content:encoded: "I think he made a mistake. But you need to understand he gives an example to people and people look up to him," Deni Avdija said of Kyrie Irving.
